post.body: You know doing this will make me love you? Why must you make me love you? You will only hurt me in the end.
Adam clones would destroy the world w/ pregnant stripper lap dances for all. He's like the George Bush of porn Or Doctor Doom.
How's the writing coming?
Five books in two days? That's insane. We did that a few months ago and it took over a week to regain consciousness.
Deal with it you spoiled hollywood whore.
BTW - Wrote two pages of the novel tonight. 25 pages after a month of nothing has finally become 27. The drought is finally fucking over.
Rob Levin has a cooler background than I do. The three spinning transformer heads say he must die.
Can we have a death match between Beranek and Cebulski. I don't know if theres enough room in the comicbook world for 2 CB's. One must fall!
Got into a heated argument with CB. He wanted to pretend to be me but wouldn't let me be him unless I came with a japanese school girl.

http://tinyurl.com/8vvdaj
Once again showing it doesn't take much to get Raven to give you head.
Just read Beyond Wonderland #4. It's fucking gorgeous. What a way to bring in the new year. Stroking my ego the whole way there. Yeeeeeah.
Spent the night getting beat up by an eight year old at wrestling. Video games are no longer for me.
The world is in for such a treat such evil not prevail. http://www.aintitcool.com/node/39626
My daughter smiles in her sleep. It is enough.
.+ I was an underage Thai-girl that didn't understand that "blow job" had nuthin to do with the vasaline soaked candles held in their hands.
Had a horrible dream last night. I dreamed I awoke in an alternative dimension and all the people were clones of Christina Beranek....
Just watched Mamet's RED BELT + I got fucking chills. Movie is entirely character driven + very slow pace but it knocks you out by the end.
Working on the novel, 2 new wonderland series, a new grimm series,+ the Waking. Just the other day I was saying I needed something to write.
Heading to blockbuster for my nightly fix of CSI not that there isn't enough on TV but I like seeing it in order.
Let's play a game. Where is Christian Bernaek? Check Spankwire where he has set up a couch and living room set. Fridge on the way.
